price: 54. Ingatlah, sesungguhnya mereka dalam keraguan tentang pertemuan mereka dengan Tuhan mereka. Ingatlah, sesungguhnya Dia Maha Meliputi segala sesuatu.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطُۢ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alā innahum fī mir'yatin min liqāi rabbihim alā innahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭun
